nodes.text: The DLT-20A blaster rifle, also known as the DLT-20A laser rifle, was a model of blaster rifle produced by BlasTech Industries. Members of the Galactic Empire's Stormtrooper Corps sometimes used DLT-20As instead of their standard issue E-11 blaster rifles. The droid bounty hunter IG-88 sometimes used this model of rifle, and carried one with it when on board the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Executor answering the Sith Lord Darth Vader's summons. Another droid in the same series, IG-11, also carried this model of rifle, without the scope attached. Another type of rifle, the pulse cannon, utilized the frame assembly of a DLT-20A.

The DLT-20A laser rifle was created as a prop for Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.[source?] Its name was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Star Wars Rebels: The Visual Guide, which was written by Adam Bray and released in 2014.
